description: Pyotr III is Ekaterina`s abusive husband and was named by his aunt the Empress Elizaveta as next in line to the Russian throne. He is alcoholic and is almost always intoxicated, even in meetings discussing plans to assassinate the Empress. He has a morbid fascination with strangling rats and playing with toy soldiers. His character is loosely based on the historical Pyotr III of Russia (1728-1762).
name: Pyotr III
